description: Come and play in the giant sandpit by our lake at Republic – buckets and spades all here for you!  And have a peek at how we have transformed a once tired office block into a cool place to work and study - with a sustainable timber refurb!

events.name: Play in the Republic sandpit
events.notes: Visitors can arrive at any time during the opening hours.There may be queues at busy times.

facilities: Family activities during open house festival

factsheet.heading: About Republic London
paragraphs: A campus development bringing universities, businesses, community groups and affordable co-working spaces together – with stunning views across the river and East London.

travel_info: Nearest tube: East India, Poplar, Canary Wharf

name: Giant Sandpit
